name: com.aurvan.ATKit.iOS
summary: ATKit is an Apple Swift framework that makes the iOS app development easier.
description:
- Extensions: ATKit provides various extensions those will reduce the lines of code you need to write to implement given feature.
- ATHttpConnectionManager: ATKit provides ATHttpConnectionManager that will allow you to send HTTP GET, POST etc. requests with ease. You can also upload files easily.
- ATCheckbox: The ATCheckbox creates a check-box control.
- ATProgressOverlay: The ATProgressOverlay creates an overlay that can be used to indicate any application activity and to disable user interaction with the application for some time.
- ATTextView: The ATTextView adds various functionalities to UITextView, e.g. placeholder.
- ATToast: The ATToast creates a self dismissing pop-up that can be used to display message to the user.
- ATWindow: The ATWindow adds various functionalities to UIWindow, e.g. dismiss keyboard on tap on screen, adjust text-field frame as per keyboard visibility.
